```{r, echo = F}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  error = TRUE,
  warning = TRUE
)
options(crayon.enabled = TRUE)
knitr::knit_hooks$set(output = function(x, options){
  paste0(
    "<pre class=\"r-output\"><code>",
    fansi::sgr_to_html(x = x),
    "</code></pre>"
  )
})
```{r}
